original_text: And when they were come to Capernaum, they that received tribute money came to Peter, and said, Doth not your master pay tribute?
korean_text: 가버나움에 이르니 반 세겔 받는 자들이 베드로에게 나아와 이르되 너의 선생은 반 세겔을 내지 아니하느냐

sentences.original_text: And when they were come to Capernaum
they that received tribute money came to Peter
Doth not your master pay tribute?
